title: Christianity and Islam: Two Religions of Peace ... Not!
description:
Geoffrey D. Falk - Christianity and Islam: Two "Religions of Peace" ... Not! (mobi, epub, pdf)


A critical comparison of the teachings and actions of the so-called Prince of Peace and the equally misnamed "Religion of Peace."

This 44-page, extensively hyperlinked essay also covers the likely near-term effects of the influx of Syrian (and other) refugees into Europe, and of the longer-term Islamization of the West.

Geoffrey D. Falk is author of "Sam Harris and 'Spirituality Without Religion'," "Stripping the Gurus: Sex, Violence, Abuse and Enlightenment," and "'Norman Einstein': The Dis-Integration of Ken Wilber." All are available for free, online.

Free eBook reader, for all O/S: http://www.calibre-ebook.com
